song.title: Christ Is Risen
song.lyrics:
[1] .F# Let no one caught in sin remain .B2 Inside the lie of inward shame .F# But fix our eyes upon the cross .B2 And run to Him who showed great love .D#m C# B2 And bled for us .D#m C# B2 Freely You’ve bled for us
[C] .F# Christ is risen from the dead .F# Trampling over death by death .B2 Come awake, come awake .D#m C# Come and rise up from the grave .F# Christ is risen from the dead .F# We are one with Him again .B2 Come awake, come awake .D#m C# Come and rise up from the grave
--- [2] .F# Beneath the weight of all our sin .B2 You bowed to none but heaven’s will .F# No scheme of hell, no scoffer's crown .B2 No burden great can hold You down .D#m C# B2 In strength You reign .D#m C# B2 Forever let Your church proclaim
[B] .F# B2 D#m C# O death, where is your sting? .F# B2 D#m C# O hell, where is your victory? .F# B2 D#m C# O church, come stand in the light .F# B2 D#m C# The glory of God has defeated the night ||
[b2] .F# B2 D#m C# O death, where is your sting? .F# B2 D#m C# O hell, where is your victory? .F# B2 D#m C# O church, come stand in the light .F# B2 Our God is not dead .D#m C# He's alive! He's alive!
